DataSourcePortable.Name: Indicador de documentos com diferença de crédito e débito
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT A.HANDLE QTD FROM CT_DOCUMENTOS A
JOIN EMPRESAS E ON E.HANDLE = A.EMPRESA
WHERE A.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA
AND ROUND( (SELECT SUM(D.VALOR) FROM CT_LANCAMENTOS D WHERE D.DOCUMENTO = A.HANDLE AND D.NATUREZA = 'D') ,2)
<> ROUND( (SELECT SUM(C.VALOR) FROM CT_LANCAMENTOS C WHERE C.DOCUMENTO = A.HANDLE AND C.NATUREZA = 'C') ,2)
AND A.DATA BETWEEN E.CONTABILIDADE AND @HOJE
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QTD" From="A" Path="QTD" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
